name: Skullonator
description:
STORY

There as been a curse spread upon the land, many people have been reduced to mere body parts,  you however, managed to survive through sheer will, and were transported to an island where you received an unholy power to use to repair the world.

There are others on this island however, who have managed to assemble themselves together, and form factions on the island, there factions are the Tribalists, Civilians, Militia, and Royals. Use your power to assemble an army of minions from stray parts, then raid the factions' structures, slaughtering their defenders, and using their body parts to further enlarge your army. As you head inward toward the center of the island, invade others, grow your army, and eventually become strong enough to defeat the False King.

CONTROLS

W, A, S, D = Move Camera

Mouse = Your minions will follow your mouse, drag it into enemies and they will automatically attack. Moving your mouse over body parts will pick them up and add them to your inventory. Click on items in your inventory to add them to the Summoning Circle.

SUMMONING

Be at the summoning circle, and then click on the body parts to put them on the summoning circle.

Each body requires 2 arms, 2 legs, a body and a head.
